verse.name: v2
verse.lines: mataifa ya dunia wakufuate wewe, unitume mimi nitume Bwana.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 1.Bwana akasema nimtume nani, aende kuwahubiria mataifa.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 2.Bwana amenituma kuhubiri habari njema kwa watu, Roho wa Bwana yu juu yangu.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 3.Kwa maana amenitia mafuta, kuwahubiri maskini habari njema.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: 4.Bwana ndiye kiongozi wangu, anisaidie kuchunga neno lake.
